11:05 <+sburjan> good morning. sdumitriu, Denis : do I have a green light to test migrations or there is something you still need to commit ?  
11:06 <+Denis> sburjan: just making some minor code style updates right now, but nothing that should change the behavior normally, maybe better to wait I finish anyway, WDYT ?  
11:06 <+sburjan> ok, I'll wait  
11:06 <+sburjan> gonna test the windows installer in the meantime, some users complained about it

14:50 <CIA-160> tmortagne master \* r486f458 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-enterprise/commit/486f458e319f2b8cc0da08d0be821703ca9b394b / (5 files in 5 dirs): XE-1152: Debian tomcat/mysql based package has wrong names - http://git.io/FzZUgA

14:52 <+sburjan> thanks  
14:56 <faryshta> has quit  
15:13 <+sburjan> tmortagne: can you tell me if this is normal: http://pastebin.com/vxvS8jNW ? I getthis when migrating a 2.7.2 to a 3.5 snapshot using MySQL  
15:14 <+tmortagne> looks like the document cache is in bad state for some reason, I doubt it has anything to do with the migration  
15:14 <+sburjan> looks lucene related  
15:15 <abusenius> has joined #xwiki  
15:15 <+sburjan> ok  
15:15 <+tmortagne> do you still have the issue after a restart ?  
15:15 <+sburjan> no  
15:16 <+tmortagne> someone reported having theses errors in the log some time ago too but I don't know what can cause this exactly, maybe flushcache  
15:17 <+tmortagne> but if it was just flushcache I think we would see this way more often, it's only the second time I see someone with this issue  
15:17 <+tmortagne> maybe it's just a "random" infinispan bug  
15:26 <faryshta> has joined #xwiki  
15:31 <+sburjan> ok, Migrations work to 3.5 latest snapshot. I think we can release 3.5.1 finally  
15:45 <DrLou\_\_> has joined #xwiki  
15:46 <DrLou\_> has quit  
15:50 <+sburjan> something is wrong on our maven repo, because I see that the latest 4.0 snapshot is from 10th April, and Denis committed today on 4.0 branch.

16:25 <+Enygma`> sburjan: http://maven.xwiki.org/snapshots/org/xwiki/enterprise/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb/4.1-SNAPSHOT/xwiki-enterprise-jetty-hsqldb-4.1-20120418.125300-24.zip  
16:25 <+Enygma`> master is now on 4.1-SNAPSHOT  
16:25 <+sburjan> yes, but I need 4.0 so I can test before releasing 4.0  
16:26 <+Enygma`> then ask Denis to cherry-pick his commit into stable-4.0.x  
16:26 <+Enygma`> ah, wait, he already did  
16:27 <+sburjan> yes, the stuff is committed, it's just not build  
16:27 <+Enygma`> :)  
16:27 <+sburjan> \*built  
16:28 <+Enygma`> as far as I can see on ci.xwiki.org, we are not building stable-4.0.x at all  
16:28 <+Enygma`> we only build 3.5 (stable-3.5.x) and 4.1 (master)  
16:28 <+sburjan> yes ... well, I'm going to wait for someone to add ci jobs for 4.0.x  
16:29 <+Enygma`> I guess that, at RC1 release, 3.5 was supposed to be dropped in favor of 4.0  
16:30 <+sburjan> no because we need 3.5.1 too.  
16:30 <+sburjan> we drop 3.5.x builds after we release 3.5.1  
16:30 <+Enygma`> yes, maybe you`re right
